transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Hello?

Sir Bharat bol raha hu.

Haan ji.

Sir abhi baat kar payenge?

Sir mai aapko ek baat bolu?

Hanji sir bataiye.

Ji apni baat na mai aapko bata du kal ho payegi.

Achha.

Han.

Kyuki abhi man lo mai aapka time bhi kharab karu usse koi fayda to hai nahi.

Hanji hanji sir.

Hanji to isliye mai aapko bolna chahta hu apni baat kal hogi vo bhi 12 baje ke baad thik hai?

Sir hum connection kar rahe the 11:30 se vo ticket ka time badh raha hai isliye.

Nahi nahi vo bhi vo aapki baat sahi hai lekin mera jo kaam hai na vo ek baar me hoga fir.

Sir ticket ka time badhega na?

Jab ticket ka time badhega to mera jo kaam hai vo ek baar me hoga. Kyuki mai kya hai pahle bhi aapko bol chuka hu.

Ki jo buylead hai vo mere ko only sir pahle to vo category wala issue tha vo to maine hata diya hai vo fir kuch na kuch dikkat aati hai vo maine dekh liya aapka profile vo jab baat hogi na tabhi tak sunaunga aapko fir mai.

Ji to koi dikkat nahi hai dekho apni baat kya hai kal ho payegi.

Hanji hanji.

Thik hai na?

Hanji hanji.

Thik.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to discuss an issue.

- Customer says issue can only be discussed tomorrow.



Resolution:

- Executive says they were trying to connect since 11:30.

- Customer says the issue will be resolved in one go.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss the issue tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category, profile, ticket
